VideoPokerGUI

Class GameBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • VideoPokerGUI.GameBoard

  • public class GameBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    Class GameBoard represents the graphical interface of the Video Poker game.

    The class is able to:

    • user - variable of type Player that represents the player of the game;
    • data - variable of type Statistics for analysis of the performance of the player in the game;
    • deck - variable of type Deck that corresponds to the deck of cards used for playing;
    • tableDB - variable of type Variants that corresponds to the information (database) from the variant of Video Poker being used.

    And also five attributes for the functioning of the game:

    • betValue - variable of type Integer that represents the value the player is betting in a move;
    • checkbet - variable of type boolean for checking if a bet was done;
    • checkdeal - variable of type boolean for checking if a deal was done;
    • checkhold - variable of type boolean for checking if a hold was done;
    • inputPlay - array of type Character that contains the commands to do the moves ($ - credit, a -advice, b - bet, s - statistics, d - deal, h - hold).

    Note that this class is abstract since the method play() is only implemented in the subclasses.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameBoard(Variants.Variants optionTable)
      Constructor specifying the initial balance (of zero, since it will be set later) and the creation of a back-end engine of type Interactive.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void initializeGUI()
      Initialize the initial contents of the frame, setting the frame properties and creating the welcome screen.
      void showAdvicePanel()
      Changes the visibility of the MainPanel panel and reveals the AdvicePanel panel with the cards to hold according to the best strategy.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameBoard

        public GameBoard(Variants.Variants optionTable)
        Constructor specifying the initial balance (of zero, since it will be set later) and the creation of a back-end engine of type Interactive. This will allow the interface to have a Player, Statistics, Deck and also a Variants according to the parameter passed to the constructor.
        Parameters:
        optionTable - variant of Video Poker used in the game.

    • Method Detail

      • initializeGUI

        public void initializeGUI()
        Initialize the initial contents of the frame, setting the frame properties and creating the welcome screen.

      • showAdvicePanel

        public void showAdvicePanel()
        Changes the visibility of the MainPanel panel and reveals the AdvicePanel panel with the cards to hold according to the best strategy.
